name: Randstad
description: At Randstad, we not only help match our talent to the right jobs, but also helping businesses reach their organizations’ goals. We do this with the help of a set of management tools, business principles, policies that enable accountability for all elements of our sustainability framework - 3P's: People, Planet, Profit. Randstad India, an ISO 9001:2015 certified company, is a wholly owned subsidiary of Randstad Holding nv, a € 23.3 billion global provider of HR services. With a legacy of over 30 years in the Indian market, Randstad is today one of the leading players in the Indian recruitment ecosystem. We believe in combining our passion for people with smart investments in intelligent technology to help organizations and talent realise their true potential.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently

enhanced_description: Randstad is a global HR services provider with a strong legacy of over 30 years in the Indian market, operating as an ISO 9001:2015 certified subsidiary of Randstad Holding nv. The company specializes in connecting talent with suitable job opportunities and assisting businesses in achieving their organizational objectives. Randstad's approach integrates a passion for people with strategic investments in intelligent technology, emphasizing a comprehensive sustainability framework known as the 3P's: People, Planet, and Profit. This framework guides their management tools, business principles, and policies to ensure accountability and positive impact across environmental sustainability, social well-being, and diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.
